column5: Right in the feels

Ohhh yes

We had a client who waited for the dog of his girlfriend to get out of the operation. He must have so financial problems because someone ran into our clinic and wanted to kill him with an axe because the client didn't give him money (?). He broke our door with it and strangled the client. Ofc we called the police and after that he only said "please don't tell my gf I will pay the bill for the door"
Not sure if I want that
Yeah that's the way I think too
Yeah that's what I would do. Just grad a towel and continue
I love your comment. Thanks

Ok passing out when seeing blood is another level. And then I would understand it.
But I heard sentences like "that's gross, don't you even know when your period starts?" and at this time I didn't know.
I also get my period in the mornings after sex, what I totally don't understand.
Sex Ed didn't work out here too. It's just like, that's a penis and a vagina and you get pregnant easily so use condoms. And ah btw girl bleed once a month. Don't forget to use condoms kids!

To be honest I didn't even understand it when I was younger. I always thought women get pregnant during their period.
Thanks, I wanted to ask because I experienced that there a a few who react really strange to it (yes it happens a lot to me)

Sooo to help you with this period problem I could maybe give you advice. 
So ofc go to the doc and ask him about it
 To take your worries at the beginning of the pill it's totally normal that your period is all messed up.
But there could be other reasons, depending on what pill you take. For example I already tried 5 different pills. But I got one it should help me with my cramps (they are really horrible, I can't even work) and my blood loss problem. It really helped with that but then my period got soo messed up. I got my period 3 whole MONTHS. the doc said its normal. Then it stopped and I didn't get my period for 2 months (I think you can imagine how I panicked)

So maybe you just need to wait a little longer that your body gets used to the hormones or talk to the doc. 
If you got any questions you can messege me tho
Thanks I hope so too

I got a good friend of mine, he doesn't want to live anymore and I totally can understand him. But it makes me so sad that I just cry for help every night, because I don't think he gets how important he is to me
Same

Yeah I always knew that he isn't fine, but I saw it gotten worse during this year. Also I have to admit that I am a big reason why it has gotten worse. But I just want to help him, I care for him a lot and he helped me a lot too
So I asked him, and he sent me a link to his post. I am glad I could help him. We also talked
He told me so. But I don't want to ask him about his name. I don't think he wants me tor read it
Thank you
